item.title: Colchicine Linked to Better Cardiovascular Outcomes in Gout
item.description: Colchicine’s anti-inflammatory effects may provide benefit, but evidence is retrospective. Medscape Medical News

item.title: A Novel Way to Spot Gait Problems in Parkinson’s
item.description: A virtual reality hallway is effective for provoking and assessing freezing of gait in patients with Parkinson’s disease. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Lenvatinib Disappoints in Metastatic Esophageal Cancer Trial
